description: User Added to an Administrator's Azure AD Role Author: Raphaël CALVET, @MetallicHack. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: PIM (Privileged Identity Management) generates this event each time 'eligible role' is enabled.
name: User Added to an Administrator's Azure AD Role
query: (Operation:"Add\ member\ to\ role." AND Workload:"AzureActiveDirectory" AND ModifiedProperties{}.NewValue:(*Admins OR *Administrator))
